summary: Kids who live on a horse ranch decide to sell the excess manure as fertilizer, but their new company soon comes under fire from the state tax board.
cast: Marty Van Hoe|Scott Schwartz|Mahlon Richmond|Cinnamon Idles|Henry Kendrick|Vincent Schiavelli|Phil Rubenstein|Elizabeth Gorcey|Tristine Skyler|Margaret Blye|Charles Hallahan|Lois Bradley|Pearl Ward|Clifton James|Allan Rich|Marian Gibson|Lisa Yanagihasha|Evelyne Yanagihasha|Bob Kempf|Roy Gaintner|Tom Mackie|Tiny Wells|Steve Archer|Lynda Kellerman|Leo Lewis|S. Victoria Marlowe|J. director: Director: Ron Maxwell (as Ronald F. Maxwell)
title: Kidco
